description: Reusable Swift sequencer module for macOS and iOS with deterministic 96 PPQN timing, multi-track MIDI sequencing, pattern/song workflows, and importable API.

items.description: Create Package.swift with SequencerEngine library and test target.
steps: Add Package.swift with library and test target declarations
Run swift package dump-package successfully

items.description: Create initial source and test directories.
steps: Create Sources/SequencerEngine and Tests/SequencerEngineTests
Add placeholder source and test files that compile

items.description: Verify baseline package build passes.
steps: Run swift build
Confirm zero build errors

items.description: Implement Tick value type fixed at 96 PPQN semantics.
steps: Add Tick type with integer storage and validation
Add unit tests for Tick construction and arithmetic

items.description: Implement BarBeatTick value type.
steps: Add BarBeatTick with bar, beat, tick fields
Add validation tests for legal and illegal values

items.description: Implement conversion from Tick to BarBeatTick for fixed 4/4.
steps: Add converter for Tick to BarBeatTick in 4/4
Add tests for known conversion fixtures

items.description: Implement conversion from BarBeatTick to Tick for fixed 4/4.
steps: Add converter for BarBeatTick to Tick in 4/4
Add round-trip tests with ARCH-006 conversions

items.description: Add time-signature-aware timeline conversion support.
steps: Support conversion across changing time signatures
Add tests covering at least one mid-sequence signature change

items.description: Define scheduler protocol for timed event dispatch.
steps: Add Scheduler protocol and basic interface contract
Add tests for compile-time usage by transport

items.description: Implement deterministic test clock for scheduler injection.
steps: Create controllable test clock implementation
Add tests proving deterministic progression

items.description: Implement deterministic tie-break ordering for same-tick events.
steps: Define stable ordering strategy for identical timestamps
Add tests proving deterministic replay order

items.description: Define Project and Sequence domain models.
steps: Implement Project and Sequence core fields
Add model construction tests

items.description: Define Track domain model with drum/MIDI type.
steps: Implement Track type with explicit track-kind enum
Add tests for track-kind constraints

items.description: Define Song and SongStep domain models.
steps: Implement Song and SongStep with reps semantics support
Add tests for basic song-step model invariants

items.description: Define MIDIEvent model for required event classes.
steps: Add MIDIEvent cases for note, program, bend, pressure, CC, SysEx
Add tests for payload range validation

items.description: Add Codable conformance and round-trip tests for core models.
steps: Add Codable to Project/Sequence/Track/Song/SongStep/MIDIEvent
Add encode-decode round-trip tests

items.description: Create SequencerEngine facade skeleton.
steps: Expose public SequencerEngine type
Compile minimal public API surface

items.description: Make SequencerEngine mutation boundary concurrency-safe.
steps: Implement actor or serial isolation strategy for engine state
Add tests for concurrent mutation safety

items.description: Implement transport states and storage.
steps: Add transport states for stop/play/record/overdub
Add tests for state representation

items.description: Implement transport transition rules.
steps: Implement valid transitions between transport states
Add tests rejecting invalid transitions

items.description: Implement locate command using BarBeatTick.
steps: Add locate API and cursor update behavior
Add tests for exact cursor positioning

items.description: Implement record-ready mode state.
steps: Add record-ready flag behavior
Add tests for enabling and disabling record-ready

items.description: Implement punch-in/out transitions for record and overdub.
steps: Support punch-in while playing when record-ready
Add tests for punch-out behavior

items.description: Implement sequence track capacity configuration (32 baseline, 99 max).
steps: Add configurable track-capacity limits
Add tests for 32 and 99 boundary cases

items.description: Enforce sequence container limit of 99.
steps: Reject creation beyond 99 sequences
Add tests for 99 accepted and 100 rejected

items.description: Enforce song container limit of 20.
steps: Reject creation beyond 20 songs
Add tests for 20 accepted and 21 rejected

items.description: Enforce per-song step limit of 250.
steps: Reject step insertion beyond 250 steps
Add tests for 250 accepted and 251 rejected

items.description: Implement primary track routing (channel plus port).
steps: Add primary route fields to track output settings
Add tests validating route assignment behavior

items.description: Implement auxiliary track routing destination.
steps: Add optional auxiliary route support
Add tests proving dual-destination output selection

items.description: Implement song-step playback progression with reps.
steps: Advance through song steps by repetition counts
Add tests for deterministic step progression

items.description: Implement song end behavior for reps=0.
steps: Treat step with reps=0 as end-of-song marker
Add tests for stop-at-end behavior

items.description: Implement song loop-to-step behavior.
steps: Add loop target step handling when song reaches end
Add tests for loop target correctness

items.description: Implement basic song-to-sequence conversion pipeline.
steps: Copy song step sequence events into destination sequence in order
Add tests for contiguous event ordering

items.description: Implement repetition-aware song-to-sequence conversion.
steps: Apply reps counts during conversion output
Add tests for expected total bars after conversion

items.description: Implement CoreMIDI output adapter skeleton.
steps: Create CoreMIDI output bridge interface
Add compile-time test with mock destination

items.description: Implement CoreMIDI input adapter skeleton.
steps: Create CoreMIDI input bridge interface
Add compile-time test with mock source events

items.description: Implement SMF Type 0 import.
steps: Parse SMF Type 0 into internal events
Add fixture test for successful import

items.description: Implement SMF Type 1 import.
steps: Parse SMF Type 1 into internal events
Add fixture test for successful import

items.description: Implement SMF Type 0 export.
steps: Serialize internal events to SMF Type 0
Add fixture test for valid export file

items.description: Implement SMF Type 1 export.
steps: Serialize internal events to SMF Type 1
Add fixture test for valid export file

items.description: Implement versioned JSON schema field for project persistence.
steps: Add schema version to persisted project format
Add tests for expected version emission

items.description: Implement JSON save and load round-trip path.
steps: Implement save and load for Project
Add round-trip tests with schema version checks

items.description: Implement quantization note-value modes including off.
steps: Support 1/8, 1/8 triplet, 1/16, 1/16 triplet, 1/32, 1/32 triplet, off
Add tests for mode selection behavior

items.description: Apply quantization in record path.
steps: Snap incoming recorded notes to selected grid
Add tests verifying record-time snapping

items.description: Apply quantization to move-existing offline operation.
steps: Quantize selected region of existing events
Add tests for region-limited quantization

items.description: Implement deterministic swing timing shift formula.
steps: Delay even subdivisions with swing-percent formula
Add tests for deterministic delay output

items.description: Enforce swing percent bounds 50 through 75.
steps: Reject out-of-range swing values
Add tests for 50, 62, 66, 75 boundaries

items.description: Implement shift timing earlier mode.
steps: Shift quantized events earlier by allowed tick amount
Add tests for earlier shift behavior

items.description: Implement shift timing later mode.
steps: Shift quantized events later by allowed tick amount
Add tests for later shift behavior

items.description: Disable shift timing behavior when quantization mode is off.
steps: No-op shift when note value is off
Add tests proving shift is inactive in off mode

items.description: Implement note repeat for drum tracks.
steps: Retrigger held drum notes at active quantize interval
Add tests for interval-accurate drum retriggering

items.description: Implement note repeat for MIDI tracks.
steps: Retrigger held MIDI notes at active quantize interval
Add tests for interval-accurate MIDI retriggering

items.description: Implement per-track on/off output control.
steps: Add track output enabled flag
Add tests proving disabled tracks emit no output

items.description: Implement solo behavior muting non-active tracks.
steps: Add solo mode state and evaluation logic
Add tests proving only solo track emits output

items.description: Implement track velocity percent scaling.
steps: Scale emitted note velocity by per-track percentage
Add tests for expected scaling outputs

items.description: Implement MIDI-only transpose guard.
steps: Apply transpose to MIDI tracks only
Add tests proving drum tracks remain untransposed

items.description: Implement sequence loop mode off and loop-to-bar.
steps: Add loop mode and loop target bar behavior
Add tests for cursor behavior at loop boundary

items.description: Implement sequence-vs-master tempo source selection.
steps: Add tempo-source selection logic
Add tests verifying active tempo changes with source

items.description: Implement mid-sequence tempo change insertion and deletion.
steps: Add tempo-change list with insertion and deletion
Add tests for list ordering by BarBeatTick

items.description: Implement tempo-change ON/OFF toggle behavior.
steps: Toggle tempo-change application during playback
Add tests proving ON applies and OFF ignores changes

items.description: Implement tap tempo using two taps.
steps: Calculate tempo from two tap intervals
Add tests for deterministic two-tap BPM calculation

items.description: Implement tap tempo averaging modes for three and four taps.
steps: Add averaging depth options for 3 and 4 taps
Add tests for deterministic averaged BPM output

items.description: Implement step edit for note events.
steps: Support insert, update, delete for note and duration fields
Add tests for note-event editing correctness

items.description: Implement step edit for program, pitch bend, and pressure events.
steps: Support insert, update, delete for program/bend/pressure events
Add tests for value-range validation

items.description: Implement step edit for CC and SysEx events.
steps: Support insert, update, delete for CC and SysEx
Add tests including SysEx payload size handling

items.description: Implement insert and delete bars operations.
steps: Implement insert blank bars and delete bar ranges
Add tests for event relocation after insert/delete

items.description: Implement copy bars operation across sequences.
steps: Copy source bar range to destination before target bar
Add tests for destination length growth

items.description: Implement copy events replace mode.
steps: Copy selected event region replacing destination events
Add tests for replace-mode exactness

items.description: Implement copy events merge mode.
steps: Copy selected event region merging into destination events
Add tests for merge behavior without destination length growth

items.description: Implement edit-loop state snapshot capture.
steps: Capture sequence state when edit loop turns on
Add tests proving snapshot exists before edits

items.description: Implement edit-loop turnOff commit behavior.
steps: Apply edits when turnOff is selected
Add tests proving committed edits persist

items.description: Implement edit-loop undoAndOff rollback behavior.
steps: Revert to snapshot when undoAndOff is selected
Add tests proving exact rollback restoration

items.description: Implement wait-for-key start behavior.
steps: Delay playback/record start until first MIDI key event when enabled
Add tests proving delayed start behavior

items.description: Implement wait-for-key trigger note exclusion from recording.
steps: Ensure first key used to start wait-for-key is not recorded
Add tests confirming trigger-note exclusion

items.description: Implement one-bar count-in behavior.
steps: Add exactly one bar of count-in before playback/record when enabled
Add tests for count-in duration and transition to bar 1

items.description: Enforce no event recording during count-in bar.
steps: Prevent event commits during count-in
Add tests proving notes are not recorded until sequence start

items.description: Implement overdub hold-erase behavior.
steps: Erase held pad/key notes in overdub erase mode
Add tests for overdub-time note removal

items.description: Implement stopped erase with ALL, ONLY, and ALL EXCEPT event filters.
steps: Add region erase with event-type filtering modes
Add tests for each filter mode correctness

items.description: Implement stopped erase note-selection behavior for MIDI and drum tracks.
steps: Support MIDI note-range erase selection
Support drum-note selection erase semantics
Add tests proving mode-specific behavior

items.description: Expose observer callback for transport state changes.
steps: Publish transport-state notifications
Add tests for event emission order

items.description: Expose observer callback for timeline position updates.
steps: Publish bar.beat.tick position updates
Add tests for monotonic cursor progression in playback

items.description: Expose observer callback for emitted MIDI events.
steps: Publish emitted event stream to observers
Add tests for deterministic observer event ordering

items.description: Document minimal 4-bar integration example in README.
steps: Write import, setup, pattern creation, and play example
Verify sample compiles in test or doc-check harness

items.description: Add scheduler jitter regression test under synthetic CPU load.
steps: Measure dispatch variance in stress harness
Assert variance stays within defined thresholds

items.description: Add deterministic 60,000-note stress scenario with no dropped scheduled events.
steps: Generate at least 60,000 note events in offline deterministic simulation
Assert scheduled event count equals emitted event count

items.description: Add property tests for timeline conversion invariants.
steps: Generate randomized timeline positions and signatures
Assert Tick to BarBeatTick to Tick round-trip invariants

items.description: Add property tests for quantization invariants.
steps: Generate randomized event timings and quantize modes
Assert quantized timings align to selected grid constraints

items.description: Run final validation and enforce no placeholder implementation paths.
steps: Run swift test and confirm pass
Run swift build -c release and confirm pass
Verify no placeholder TODO/stub code remains in shipped paths
